snippet.title: Matching Meadows Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2751220/Matching_Meadows/

Matching Meadows is a deck-based puzzle game that combines the simple pleasures of building a vibrant city with challenging objectives. Build your own idyllic landscape! To reach the top of the leaderboards, you'll have to strategize and carefully plan ahead.
